extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN212 and FREN220 and Level 4 and registration in a FREN or FRLG Plan.
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN407; FREN391; FREN491.

basic.description: Focuses on a specific author or on a specific theme of Quebec literature. Topics will depend on the professor's interest and field of research. Travaux pratiques include tests, an oral presentation and an in-depth essay. Given jointly with FREN 391/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Auteurs et thèmes en littérature québécoise
